title: State Capitol Report: Dissecting Speaker Vos' Bold GOP Agenda
teaser: When the state Legislature convenes in January, Assembly Republicans will have their biggest majority since the 1950s. In the State Capitol Report, Joy Cardin’s guest journalist discusses the “papal encyclical” that he says is Assembly Speaker Robin Vos’ agenda, and the items that he says may have surprised even Gov. Scott Walker and Senate Republicans.
